tags: Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I had visited the dentist for my front teeth capping. The capping had to be done for two front teeths. First problem i faced was that after almost 17 days of the capping, my caps came out while i was chewing the food. This was not at all acceptable. I had informed doctor and he called the next day for corrections. Then he did add some cementing along with the caps which i am not sure why he did not add in previous fitting. So he did that fixing with cementing. But there was change i observed, teeths were more inwards compared to previous position. So the whole purpose of aesthetics is gone and only thing left was fixing the caps irrespective of the fact how does it look which matters when teeth are front faced. Next time when i visited again, he directly said no and told nothing can be done now. If i want any changes, there will be chances of original teeth to break. So, why the cementing has been done in such a way that it can lead to breakage i do not understand. ****** ****** ** **** ** ** ********** ** *** ****. *** **** ** *** *** ******** ********* **** ** *** ******** ******* ** *** ***** ******
I would not recommend him *** ******* ***********

tags: Value for money,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,
review: I visited to treat my 6 years old daughter as she was feeling pain in tooth. Doctor suggested RCT , I agreed  but not satisfied with treatment. By mistake of Doctor needle pierced in the mouth of daughter and blood flowing . Doctor charged very high and didn't explain the cost of treatment. He charged so high almost thrice in other sector of rohini.  Even after RVT daughter is feeling pain in tooth and unable to eat. Now if I again visit Doctor to find reason for pain in tooth even after his treatment,  he will charge much for doing another treatment.  I will treat my daughter now in another place or dentist.  Not satisfied with treatment of Doctor and now he charge very much for treatment. I am highly disappointed and dissatisfied

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited Dr. Vishal on a family relative's recommendation and our experience with him was amazing. My daughters had several cavities which required immediate filling treatment. I was concerned because my daughters are too young but it was an appropriate decision to visit Dr. Vishal. He made the process so smooth n fun-filled for kids that my kids enjoyed and even the deep cavities were filled in a Jiffy. Thank you kinder smile and Dr. Vishal. I would recommend everyone to visit him for any tooth related query.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review:
We went with two naughty 3 year old twin daughters.
We were worried as each one had 5 cavities in total.
Dr. Arya explained the issues to us, calmed down the girls and completed the procedure in less than 30 minutes.
His friendliness and ability to engage kids in fun activities needs a special mention.
We were not expecting kids to be so supportive for a dental procedure but they were very comfortable around the doctor.
It took us 2 seatings to get total 10 cavities filled.
Very satisfied with the experience.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: *** **** ** *** *** ** *** **** ******. When somebody referred me to him for my daughter's treatment then I was tensed that how the doctor would be. But he made us relaxed and handled the case in very friendly way. The expenditure of the complete treatment was also reasonable. As we had to travel 60-70 kms for the treatment, he understood the problem and solved the case in 2 visits only. I have full trust on him now. And since this treatment, he is now our family dentist. Thank you DR. ARYA.. you are the best...

review: I went for dental filling for my daughter who was 8 yrs old. The doctor didn't tell me that it was milk teeth and her permanent teeth is also growing. I will never recommend him. Too expensive.
reply_text: The permanent teeth start erupting (growing) at 7-8 years of age but the age of coming in mouth is around 10 years till that time milk teeth need to be saved. Any tooth if it needs to be filled should be filled irrespective of whether it's permanent or milk.
